item.title: Phoneme Scoring
item.description: Phoneme Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 20 seconds long reference text up to 100 characters. Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required phoneme refText string required reference text Only phoneme representation in SpeechEvalPro format is supported, see English Phonetic Symbol Comparison Table for details. Multiple phonetic symbols are separated by English spaces exampleï¼š

item.title: Word Scoring
item.description: Word Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 20 seconds long reference text up to 100 characters. Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required word refText string required reference text Reference text support English special label format exampleï¼š { "mode":"word", "refText":"good morning" } Evaluation Results # A complete example of the JSON response result field type remark taskId string taskID timestamp integer task timestamp audioUrl string audio storage url (this field is only returned when the question type parameter audioUrl=true) audioInfo dict Audio Quality Information refText string reference text hypothesis string actual text read overall double total score (range determined by scale) accuracy double accuracy (range determined by point scale) waveTime integer actual recording timeï¼ˆmsï¼‰ startTime integer the starting reading position in a recording (ms)ï¼ˆmsï¼‰ endTime integer the ending reading position in a recording (ms)ï¼ˆmsï¼‰ wordInfo list<dict> array of word info objects (ðŸ‘‡) wordInfo # field type remark refText string reference text hypothesis string actual text read score double total score (range determined by scale) accuracy double word accuracy (range determined by point scale) rhythm dict **word rhythm info objects ** â”œâ”€ stressRef integer word stress label (1 means it should be accented, 0 means it shouldn’t be accented/do not check) â”œâ”€ stressScore integer word stress score (1 means actually agrees with label, 0 means doesn’t match/do not check) type string word type startTime integer the starting reading position in a recording (ms) endTime integer the ending reading position in a recording (ms) syllables list<dict> array of syllable info objects, refer to SpeechEvalPro scheme English Phonetic Symbol Comparison Table â”œâ”€ syllable string phonemic composition of syllables.

item.title: Sentence Scoring
item.description: Sentence Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 40 seconds long reference text up to 300 characters. can be set to enable real-time return results Evaluation parameters Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required sentence refText string required reference text Reference text support English special label format exampleï¼š { "mode":"sentence", "refText":"Hi there.

item.title: Paragraphs Scoring
item.description: Paragraph Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 300 seconds long reference text up to 10,000 characters. can be set to enable real-time return results Evaluation parameters Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required chapter refText string required reference text Reference text support English special label format exampleï¼š { "mode":"chapter", "refText":"I believe there is a person who brings sunshine into your life.

English paragraph evaluation question type returns the original result # Final evaluation result # { "accuracy":71.0856475830078, "endTime":8260, "fluency":85.3683471679688, "hypothesis":"i believe there is person who brings sunshine into life person may have enough to spread around", "integrity":82.6015625, "overall":82.368522644043, "refText":"I believe there is a person who brings sunshine into your life. That person may have enough to spread around.", "sentenceInfo":[ { "endTime":4390, "fluency":{ "overall":84.

English phoneme evaluation question type returns the original result # Final evaluation result # { "accuracy": 98.1348571777344, "endTime": 770, "hypothesis": "t iy", "integrity": 100, "overall": 98.1348571777344, "phonemes": [ { "endTime": 380, "hypothesis": "t", "phoneme": "t", "score": 96.6922836303711, "startTime": 160, "type": "normal" }, { "endTime": 770, "hypothesis": "iy", "phoneme": "iy", "score": 99.
